definition: showing an excessively deferential manner, managing the bow in playing a stringed instrument
details:
adjective
- showing an excessively deferential manner
= synonyms: bowed
noun
- managing the bow in playing a stringed instrument
= example: managing the bow in playing a stringed instrument
- bending the head or body or knee as a sign of reverence or submission or shame or greeting
= synonyms: obeisance
